Commands.Red Spiral: 4-HIT magic BRV+HP attack  Grants 「Small Attack Up」 for 3 turns
Commands.White Whorl: 4-HIT Wind magic BRV+HP attack  Moderate chance of 「Small Defense Down」 for 2 turns
Commands.Luminescence: 5-HIT Holy magic BRV+HP attack  Inflicts 「Blind」 for 1 turn
Commands.BRV Up Attack Up: Raises own BRV based on Attack  Slightly raises Attack for 2 turns  No action delay  Doesn't increase turn count  Decreases Friend Support and Summon action count
Commands.Pyroclasm: 4-HIT Fire magic BRV+HP attack  BRV stolen can overflow up to 120% Max BRV  Deals 20% HP damage to non-targets  After using 「Red Spiral」, 「Red Spiral+」 or 「While Whorl」, 「While Whorl+」:  - Turns to 「Pyroclasm+」  　∟ Increased potency

Passives.Red Spiral Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with  Red Spiral ,  Whiteout
Passives.White Whorl Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with  White Whorl ,  Luminescence
Passives.Spirit of Competition: Grants 100% critical hit rate when BRV equals or exceeds Initial BRV and target's BRV is over twice of that BRV
Passives.Break Bonus Up: Slightly raises Break Bonus earned after breaking an enemy
Passives.Longing for the Sky: Slightly raises Speed for 1 turn when BRV equals 0
Passives.Red Spiral Extend: Red Spiral  use +2Allows Whiteout to be executed from the 2nd useWhen using  Red Spiral  and  Whiteout :- Tremendously raises total potency- BRV stolen can overflow up to 120% Max BRV- Raises BRV based on 25% of HP damage dealtWhen using  Red Spiral :- Slightly improves the  Attack Up  buff and extends its duration by 4 turnsAfter using  Red Spiral  5 times:-  Red Spiral  turns into  Red Spiral+ :   Slightly raises its potency  BRV stolen can overflow up to 150%  Raises BRV based on 50% of HP damage dealt-  Whiteout  turns into  Whiteout+ :   Slightly raises its potency  BRV stolen can overflow up to 150%  Raises BRV based on 50% of HP damage dealt  Grants  Soaring to Freedom  for 16 turns Soaring to Freedom  raises Attack and grants BRV Regen
Passives.Buff Attack&Boost Up: Moderately raises Max BRV and Attack while buffed
Passives.White Whorl Extend: White Whorl  use +2Allows  Luminescence  to be executed from the 2nd useWhen using  White Whorl  and  Luminescence :- Tremendously raises total potency- BRV stolen can overflow up to 150% Max BRVWhen using  White Whorl :- Raises BRV based on 50% of HP damage dealt- Grants  Medium Max BRV Up  for 8 turnsAfter using  White Whorl  5 times:-  White Whorl  turns into  White Whorl+ ,   Slightly raises its potency  BRV stolen can overflow up to 180%  Raises BRV based on 100% of HP damage dealt-  Luminescence  turns into  Luminescence+ :   Slightly raises its potency  BRV stolen can overflow up to 180%  Grants  Soaring to Freedom  for 16 turnsWhile buffed,  BRV Attack  turns into  BRV Attack+ :- Increases the number of BRV hits to 2- Greatly raises its potencyWhile  Soaring to Freedom  is active,  BRV Attack  and  BRV Attack+  turns into  BRV Attack++ :- Change the attribute to Magic- Increases the number of BRV hits to 3- Moderately raises its potency (from  BRV Attack+ )- Lowers Action Delay
Passives.Radiance of Bravery and Destruction: Raises Initial BRV and Max BRV by 20%
Passives.BRV Up Attack Up Extend: When using  BRV Up Attack Up :- Slightly improves  Attack Up  effect

Weapons.Reeler's Edge CP: 15: Slightly raises Max BRV and Attack for 5 turns after breaking an enemy
Weapons.Platinum Sword CP: 15: When using  Red Spiral ,  Red Spiral+ :- Raises BRV potency- Extends the duration of  Attack Up
Weapons.Demonsbane CP: 70: May equip the EX Ability  Pyroclasm
Weapons.Zwill Blade CP: 35: When using  White Whorl ,  White Whorl+ :- Raises BRV potency- Improves  Defense Down , extends its duration and raises its success rateWhen using  Luminescence ,  Luminescence+ :- Raises BRV potency- Raises the success rate of  Blind
Weapons.Sword of an Ersatz Sky Pirate CP: 15: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with  Red Spiral ,  Red Spiral+ ,  Whiteout ,  Whiteout+ ,  White Whorl ,  White Whorl+ ,  Luminescence ,  Luminescence+
